text: Opsariichthys bidens is a species of cyprinid in the genus Opsariichthys. It inhabits China, Japan, North Korea, South Korea, Laos and Vietnam. It has a maximum length of and a maximum published weight of . ==References== Category:Cyprinid fish of Asia Category:Freshwater fish of China Category:Fish of Laos Category:Fish of Japan Category:Fish of Vietnam Category:Fish of Korea
title: Opsariichthys bidens
